ğŸ‘‹ Hello there! Welcome. Please follow the steps below to tell us about your contribution.

1. Copy the correct template for your contribution

    - ğŸ› Are you fixing a bug? Copy the template from <https://github.com/ObamaFoundation/gh-templates/blob/main/.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/bugfix.md>
    - ğŸ“ Are you updating documentation? Copy the template from <https://github.com/ObamaFoundation/gh-templates/blob/main/.github/PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE/documentation.md>

2. Replace this text with the contents of the template
3. Fill in all sections of the template
4. Click "Create pull request"
